formalpara.title: Figure 3. Metabolic flux in microaerobic conditions.
formalpara.para: In the diagram, only the formation of (G)ATP is indicated (not its consumption). This diagram is primarily based on the work of McElwee et al. (2006), Holt and Riddle (2003), and Burnell et al., (2005). Note that LDH activity is increased in hypoxia only; LDH expression level is lowered in the dauer stage.
